Title: The Losers
Writer: Peter Berg (screenplay), James Vanderbilt (screenplay), Andy Diggle (comic book series), Jock (comic book series)
Actors: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Zoe Saldana, Chris Evans, Idris Elba
Plot: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.
Production: Warner Bros., Weed Road Pictures, Dark Castle Entertainment
